ch.gbssg.app.ila.kv

Class KvController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.gbssg.core.pac.AgentController
      • ch.gbssg.app.ila.kv.KvController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgentController

    public class KvController
extends AgentController
    Represents the Controller for the Intermediate Level Agent KV This agent is the Main Dialog for the User of the type KV It handles all basic action which should be performed
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Michael Huber
